title: COMFEE EM720CPL-PMB Countertop Microwave Oven with Sound On/Off, ECO Mode and Easy One-Touch Buttons, 0.7 Cu Ft, Black
description: This COMFEE' 0.7 Cubic foot 700 watt microwave oven features convenient one Touch cooking, 11 power levels, mute button, and removable turntable in a compact footprint to fit in a cabinet or on the counter. The large LED digital display has a clock function and can also display a kitchen timer as well as the cooking time remaining. Includes an energy saving eco mode where the LED display can be turned off. A convenient mute button turns off the microwave beeps for quiet operation. Its smaller size is ideal for apartment kitchens, vacation homes, offices or dorms.；The product voltage arrange is 110V
